install.author: Acyba

param.name: help
param.label: Help
param.description: Click on the help button to get some help

param.name: effect
param.label: DISPLAY_EFFECT
param.description: Select the effect you want to add to your module

param.name: lists
param.label: VISIBLE_LISTS
param.description: The following selected lists will be added on the Module and will be visible (if they are not selected as automatically subscribed to).

param.name: hiddenlists
param.label: AUTO_SUBSCRIBE_TO
param.description: The user will be automatically subscribed to the selected lists. They won't be displayed on your module but if the user subscribes, he will be subscribed to those lists as well

param.name: displaymode
param.label: DISPLAY_MODE
param.description: Select whether you want to display the form in a line or vertically

param.name: listschecked
param.label: LISTS_CHECKED_DEFAULT
param.description: The selected lists will be checked by default on your module if they are visible.

param.name: checkmode
param.label: CHECKED_MODE
param.description: If you select the first option - Show user's subsription status - only the lists that the logged-in user is subscribed to will be checked. This option has an effect on logged-in users only so you can choose whether you want to display his own subscription or always the default one.

param.name: dropdown
param.label: DROPDOWN_LISTS
param.description: Display the visible lists in a dropdown

param.name: overlay
param.label: DESC_OVERLAY
param.description: Add the description of each visible list as an overlay of the list name. Be careful, you might have conflicts using this option if you have some flash elements on your website.

param.name: link
param.label: LINKED_ARCHIVE
param.description: Add a link to the archive section for each list.

param.name: customfields
param.label: DISP_FIELDS
param.description: Select the fields you want to display on your subscription module

param.name: nametext
param.label: CAPT_NAME
param.description: Text displayed on the name field. If you don't specify anything, the default value will be used from the current language file

param.name: emailtext
param.label: CAPT_EMAIL
param.description: Text displayed on the e-mail field. If you don't specify anything, the default value will be used from the current language file

param.name: fieldsize
param.label: FIELD_SIZE
param.description: Specify the size of the email and name fields on your subscription form

param.name: displayfields
param.label: DISP_TEXT_MODE
param.description: Display the Name and E-mail text inside or outside the field?

param.name: introtext
param.label: INTRO_TEXT
param.description: This text will be displayed before the form inside a span class=acymailing_introtext

param.name: finaltext
param.label: POST_TEXT
param.description: This text will be displayed after the form inside a span class=acymailing_finaltext

param.name: showsubscribe
param.label: DISP_SUB_BUTTON
param.description: Display the subscribe button on the module

param.name: subscribetext
param.label: CAPT_SUB
param.description: Text displayed on the subscribe button. If you don't specify anything, the default value will be used from the current language file

param.name: subscribetextreg
param.label: CAPT_SUB_LOGGED
param.description: Text displayed on the subscribe button if the user is logged in. If you don't specify anything, the default value will be used from the current language file

param.name: showunsubscribe
param.label: DISP_UNSUB_BUTTON
param.description: Display the unsubscribe button on the module

param.name: unsubscribetext
param.label: CAPT_UNSUB
param.description: Text displayed on the unsubscribe button. If you don't specify anything, the default value will be used from the current language file

param.name: redirectmode
param.label: REDIRECT_MODE
param.description: After submitting the form, the user can be redirected to the previous page, to the Acymailing archive page or to a custom link (in that case, please write the url in the next field)

param.name: redirectlink
param.label: REDIRECT_LINK
param.description: If you selected the mode 'Custom Redirect Link', the user will be redirected to this url after clicking on the button subscribe

param.name: redirectlinkunsub
param.label: REDIRECTION_UNSUB
param.description: If you selected the mode 'Custom Redirect Link', the user will be redirected to this url after clicking on the button unsubscribe

param.name: showterms
param.label: JOOMEXT_TERMS
param.description: Display the 'Accept Terms and Conditions' box

param.name: showtermspopup
param.label: TERMS_POPUP
param.description: If you select 'Yes', the article linked to the terms and conditions will be displayed in a popup, otherwise it will be displayed as a separated page

param.name: termscontent
param.label: TERMS_CONTENT
param.description: The selected article will be displayed if the user clicks on the link 'Terms and Conditions'

param.name: mootoolsintro
param.label: MOO_INTRO
param.description: This text will be displayed before the Mootools button in case of you use the Mootools effect

param.name: mootoolsbutton
param.label: MOO_BUTTON
param.description: Text displayed on the Mootools button in case of you use the Mootools effect. If you don't specify anything, the default value will be used from the current language file

param.name: boxwidth
param.label: MOO_BOX_WIDTH
param.description: If you use the Mootools Box effect, you can set the width of the box in this area

param.name: boxheight
param.label: MOO_BOX_HEIGHT
param.description: If you use the Mootools Box effect, you can set the height of the box in this area

param.name: textalign
param.label: Module Alignment
param.description: This option enables you to align the text inside the module

param.name: loggedin
param.label: Auto identify logged in users
param.description: Do you want the logged in users to be automatically identified in the module?

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: includejs
param.label: Include JS files
param.description: How should AcyMailing add the necessary JS files

param.name: itemid
param.label: Itemid
param.description: Menu ID used in the archive links coming from this module
